title: The whole art of drawing, painting, limning, and etching collected out of the choicest Italian and German authors : to which is added exact rules of proportion for drawing the heads of men, women and children , of what bigness soever / originally invented and written by the famous Italian painter Odoardo Fialetti, painter of Boloign ; published for the benefit of all ingenuous gentlemen and artists by Alexander Brown ...
author: Fialetti, Odoardo, 1573-1638.
publisher: Printed for Peter Stint ... and Simon Miller ...,
notes: Translation of an unidentified work probably written in Italian.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
